name: Midnight Melody
description:
Welcome to Midnight Melody, an arcade maze game inspired by Pac-Man and Solar Fox! Sitting under the moonlight with your headphones, you're trying to get away from all the stress by listening to music!

The game has infinite levels. It's a high score arcade game. Musical notes, blue shields and mines are randomly selected out of a set of levels.

Feel free to share your high score!

Controls
  • Arrows or ASDW for movement
  • Press [Z] or [J] for slowdown
  • Hold [X] or [K] to go faster
  • Press [C] or [L] to stop your momentum

[Z] or [J] to skip the title screen / splash screen and the game over screen

Developer's Notes
